𝗖𝗟𝗢𝗨𝗗𝗬𝗣𝗔𝗗 | Deploying and managing a personal cloud gaming server to stream games without requiring a powerful local machine or a subscription.  🔥 Super Hot!

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📘 TypeScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Deploying and managing a personal cloud gaming server to stream games without requiring a powerful local machine or a subscription.
📅 Created: Nov 2023 • Updated: Jun 2025

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Cloud gaming platform alternative
✅ Stream games with Moonlight
✅ Supports Steam, Pegasus, and Lutris
✅ Deployable on AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, Scaleway, and Paperspace
✅ No screen or virtual screen needed
✅ Pay-by-the-hour pricing
✅ Sunshine and Wolf streaming server options
✅ Cost reduction and management features (cost alerts, spot instances, automated shutdown)


❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐ 498 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 25 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 23 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Cloudy Pad is an open-source alternative to cloud gaming platforms like GeForce Now, allowing users to deploy their own gaming server on various cloud providers. It supports streaming via Moonlight, integrates with game launchers like Steam and Lutris, and offers cost management features such as spot instance utilization and automated shutdowns, providing a pay-as-you-go cloud gaming experience.

❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/PierreBeucher/cloudypad

𝗕𝗥𝗢𝗪𝗦𝗛 | Browsing the web on low-bandwidth connections or resource-constrained devices.  🔥 Super Hot!

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📜 JavaScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Browsing the web on low-bandwidth connections or resource-constrained devices.
📅 Created: May 2016 • Updated: Jun 2025

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Text-based browser
✅ TTY rendering
✅ Headless Firefox backend
✅ Bandwidth optimization
✅ SSH/MoSH support


━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 17.5K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 433 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 226 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Browsh is a text-based browser that utilizes a headless Firefox instance to render modern web pages in a terminal or another browser. It's designed for use in situations with limited bandwidth or on devices with low processing power, allowing users to access the web via SSH or MoSH connections.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/browsh-org/browsh

𝗣𝗔𝗖𝗞𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗡 | Generating and monitoring network packets for debugging, testing, and security analysis.  🔥 Super Hot!

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐹 Go 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Generating and monitoring network packets for debugging, testing, and security analysis.
📅 Created: Apr 2024 • Updated: Jun 2025

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Packet generation with customizable network interfaces
✅ Packet monitoring on specified network interfaces
✅ TUI interface for packet analysis
✅ Packet filtering
✅ Detailed packet view


◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐ 212 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 2 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 45 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Packémon is a TUI tool for generating and monitoring network packets. It allows users to craft and send custom packets over specified network interfaces and observe network traffic in real-time. The tool provides features for packet filtering and detailed packet analysis, making it suitable for network debugging, testing, and security assessments.

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Performance analysis and optimization of games and other applications.
📅 Created: Mar 2020 • Updated: Jun 2025

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Real-time profiling
✅ Nanosecond resolution
✅ Remote telemetry
✅ Hybrid frame and sampling profiler
✅ CPU profiling (C, C++, Lua, Python, Fortran)
✅ GPU profiling (OpenGL, Vulkan, Direct3D 11/12, Metal, OpenCL, CUDA)
✅ Memory allocation profiling
✅ Lock profiling
✅ Context switch profiling
✅ Screenshot attribution


╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍╍

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 12.1K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 818 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 193 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Tracy is a real-time, nanosecond-resolution profiler designed for analyzing the performance of applications, particularly games. It supports CPU and GPU profiling, memory allocation tracking, lock contention analysis, and context switch monitoring. Tracy offers remote telemetry and hybrid frame/sampling profiling capabilities, with direct support for C, C++, Lua, Python, and Fortran, as well as bindings for other languages.

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

OpenResty Manager is a host management panel designed as an open-source alternative to OpenResty Edge. It simplifies the process of securing reverse proxy websites, managing hosts, and deploying applications through a user-friendly web interface and an application store. It also automates free SSL certificate management and provides tools for access control and denial of service protection.

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

ScreenToGif is a tool for recording a selected area of your screen, live webcam feed, or sketchboard drawings. It allows users to edit the recordings and save them as GIFs, videos, or other image formats. The application provides a comprehensive solution for creating and editing screen recordings for various purposes.
